name: Scouting Woods Disc Golf Course
description: The most beginner course around. Surely the crew has no issues getting in pars or birdies every hole.

name: Hawkings Woods Disc Golf
description: Long holes and lots of woods, what more could you want?

name: South Shore Disc Golf
description: If you can get it into the circle and also figure out where youre going its fun but nobody here can do both of those
